Auth.Password must be at least 8 characters l: Password must be at least 8 characters long
Auth.Password must contain at least one numbe: Password must contain at least one number
Auth.Password must contain at least one upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
Auth.Password must contain at least one lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
Auth.Password must contain at least one speci: Password must contain at least one special character

About.project1: PUTMAN is a universal testing, development, and REST API platform. It provides a clean interface that replaces disparate tools like Postman, Curl, and the command line, bringing together everything you need to work with an API into one powerful yet simple web application.
About.project2: PUTMAN is positioned as a 'Swiss knife' for backend developers, QA engineers and API designers. Unlike heavy desktop applications, PUTMAN works directly in the browser, without requiring installation, and offers a modern, minimalist UI.
About.project3: The key idea is not just to send requests, but to manage the entire life cycle of interaction with the API: from writing and debugging individual requests to organizing collections, automated testing, documentation and monitoring the health (health check) of your services.
About.rs: We would like to express our gratitude to RS school and all its staff for giving us the opportunity to try something new and interesting. Thank you for your time. Special thanks to our mentors who helped and motivated us on this long, difficult, but incredibly exciting path.
About.author1Description: Hello, my name is Dima, I am 33 years old, I am from Gomel (Belarus). My first attempts to create a website were in my school years. I abandoned this idea and did something else. And now, many years later, I decided to make my dream come true...
About.author2Description: Hello. My name is Roma. My first programming language was Java, but I quickly discovered that JavaScript resonated with me more. I think it has to do with the dynamic nature of language and its universality.  Our team decided to write the final project in Next js! This is a very interesting framework that is especially attractive to me because it allows create fullstack applications.
About.author3Description: Hello, my name is Husan. I am interested in frontend and backend, I like to understand the architecture of applications and learn new things. I am always open to new knowledge and experiments.
